short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the comment section of YouTube videos. If necessary they can be shown again by clicking the extension icon in the address bar.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hides the comment section of YouTube™ videos. If necessary they can be shown again by clicking the extension icon in the address bar.
